  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140149</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140149</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kako primerjati hitrosti ob različnih časovnih trenutkih</string>
            <string language="en">How to compare velocities at different times</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man Geschwindigkeiten zu den unterschiedlichen 
Zeiten vergleicht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment comparer des vitesses à différentes 
heures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como comparar velocidades em horas diferentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come confrontare le velocità ai tempi differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να συγκρίνει τις ταχύτητες στους διαφορετικούς 
χρόνους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo comparar velocidades en diversas horas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Določitev spremembe hitrosti pri enakomernem gibanju s pomočjo grafične metode odštevanja vektorjev.</string>
            <string language="en">Determining the velocity difference between two time points in case of uniform circular motion with the use of vector subtraction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">enakomerno kroženje</string>
            <string language="en">uniform circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sprememba hitrosti</string>
            <string language="en">velocity change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vektorsko odštevanje</string>
            <string language="en">vector subtraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestimmung des Geschwindigkeit Unterschiedes 
zwischen zwei Zeitpunkten falls von der konstanten kreisförmigen 
Bewegung mit dem Gebrauch von vektorabzug.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détermination de la différence de vitesse entre 
deux points de temps en cas de mouvement circulaire uniforme avec 
l'utilisation de la soustraction de vecteur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinando a diferença da velocidade entre dois 
pontos do tempo caso que do movimento circular uniforme com o uso da 
subtração do vetor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determinazione della differenza di velocità fra 
due punti di volta nel caso di movimento circolare dell'uniforme 
con l'uso di sottrazione di vettore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο καθορισμός της διαφοράς ταχύτητας μεταξύ του χρόνου
δύο δείχνει σε περίπτωση ομοιόμορφης κυκλικής κίνησης με τη 
χρήση της διανυσματικής αφαίρεσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determinación de la diferencia de la velocidad 
entre dos puntas del tiempo en caso de que del movimiento circular 
uniforme con el uso de la substracción del vector.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konstante kreisförmige Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit Änderung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vektorabzug</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement circulaire uniforme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changement de vitesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">soustraction de vecteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento circular uniforme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mudança da velocidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">subtração do vetor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento della circonvallazione dell'uniforme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento di velocità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sottrazione di vettore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ομοιόμορφη κυκλική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αλλαγή ταχύτητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διανυσματική αφαίρεση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento circular uniforme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cambio de la velocidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">substracción del vector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecánicos</string>
          </keyword>
